title: Lucky Coin
summaries: The Lucky Coin is an extremely rare Hardmode accessory that while equipped causes enemies to drop extra coins when damaged. The Lucky Coin is dropped by pirates during a Pirate Invasion at a rate of 0.025*1/4000 (0.025%), from the Pirate Captain at a rate of 0.1*1/1000 (0.1%) or from the Flying Dutchman at a rate of 0.5*1/200 (0.5%). It is not dropped by Parrots.

With the Lucky Coin equipped, there is a 20*1/5 (20%) chance that 1 to 10 extra coins will drop each time the player damages an enemy. Each time extra coins drop, the following probabilities determine the coin type:

• 89.1% chance for [img:Copper Coin]Copper Coins
  • 9.9% chance for [img:Silver Coin]Silver Coins
  • 1% chance for [img:Gold Coin]Gold Coins
